articles.title: Terry Francona doesn't hold back in assessment of umpires' overturned call that led to his ejection - Bally Sports Ohio & Great Lakes
articles.description: Following the Cleveland Guardians' 4-2 home win over the Chicago White Sox, Tito elaborates on the overturned call in the 4th inning that led to his ejection.
